mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (b BOARD_PK_BNO) */ rownum rnum, level, b.bno, b.subject, b.content, m.name writer, b.writedate, b.hitcount, b.p_bno FROM board b, member m WHERE b.writer = m.memberid(+) START WITH b.p_bno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR b.bno = b.p_bno ORDER SIBLINGS BY b.bno DESC ) t WHERE rnum >= (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND rnum <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
SELECT b.bno, b.subject, b.content, m.name writer, b.writedate, b.hitcount, b.p_bno FROM board b, member m WHERE b.bno = #{value} AND b.writer = m.memberid(+)
